page.title: 10LOCAL HISTORY OF FORFAR
page.content: {Monuments}There is a small tower on{ {Castle Hill}which in the olden days stood in the middle of the town.It was called the Mercat Cross.All things that the king wished the people to know were read out from the top of this tower.Sometimes people were hanged there.As time went by,carts began to bump into it and it was getting ruined and so the Town Council took it apart stone by stone and it was rebuilt on the mound where the old Forfar Castle once stood.Someone has said it would be good if a circle of stones could mark the old site of the tower in the centre of town. You can get the key of the tower from Adamson the stationer along Castle St. Go along Canmore St.unlock the metal gate, follow the path and you'll get to Castle Hill tower.
